channel.title: Worn - Hern [Experimental]
channel.description:
New song from an upcoming album, not sure when I'll be done with it or when I'll release it but eh just stay tuned. Sample-based and experimental with some noise and drone parts.
Song link is here (Runtime: 8:37) - https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/worn
Hope you guys enjoy, constructive criticism is welcome as always.

item.description:
Just wanna say it here too, totally awesome. Well played!
